full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Orange Immersion Suits and Liners**

** Solicitation Number: ** W8485-247665/A

** Publication Date:** November 27, 2023

** Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2024, 14:00:00 EST

** Expected Contract Start Date:** December 12, 2023

** Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2028

** Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

** Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

** Selection Criteria:** Not Applicable

We invite interested suppliers to submit a statement of capabilities for the supply of orange immersion suits and liners in accordance with the requirements outlined below.

** Bidding Requirements: **

The Department of National Defence seeks proposals for the supply of specialized flight clothing and accessories, including orange immersion suits and liners. The requirements are as follows:

* Orange immersion suits (NSNs: 8475-20-005-5778/9/0/1): 5 FY23/24, 5 FY24/25, and 10 FY25/26/27 (various sizes)
* Liners for orange immersion suits (NSNs: 8475-20-002-2724/5/6/7/8/9): 5 FY23/24, 10-25 FY24/25, and 10-35 FY25/26/27/28 (various sizes)

** Exclusions and Limited Tendering Reason: **

This tender is subject to the exclusion under subsection 6(d) of the Government Contracts Regulations, where only one supplier is capable of performing the work (Mustang Survival Corp.). The Department of National Defence has determined that Mustang Survival Corp. is the only supplier that possesses the requisite expertise and experience in the production of these items.

** Trade Agreements: **

This procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and other applicable trade agreements.

** Ownership of Intellectual Property: **

Ownership of any foreground intellectual property arising out of the proposed contract will vest in the contractor.

** Contract Value and Delivery Terms: **

The estimated contract value is $2,655,495.00 CAD (taxes excluded). Delivery of items must commence by the end of March 2024.

** Contact Information: **

For inquiries and statements of capabilities submissions
